name: TimePickerDialog
desc: A Material Design time picker designed to appear inside a popup dialog.

fields.name: initialTime
fields.desc: The time initially selected when the dialog is shown.

fields.name: cancelText
fields.desc: Optionally provide your own text for the cancel button.

fields.name: confirmText
fields.desc: Optionally provide your own text for the confirm button.

fields.name: helpText
fields.desc: Optionally provide your own help text to the header of the time picker.

fields.name: errorInvalidText
fields.desc: Optionally provide your own validation error text.

fields.name: hourLabelText
fields.desc: Optionally provide your own hour label text.

fields.name: minuteLabelText
fields.desc: Optionally provide your own minute label text.

fields.name: restorationId
fields.desc: Restoration ID to save and restore the state of the [TimePickerDialog].

fields.name: initialEntryMode
fields.desc: The entry mode for the picker. Whether it's text input or a dial.

fields.name: orientation
fields.desc: The optional [orientation] parameter sets the [Orientation] to use when displaying the dialog.

fields.name: onEntryModeChanged
fields.desc: Callback called when the selected entry mode is changed.
